tool_description: Empower your digital marketing with LDE's Business Reviews API, the ultimate API-first integration partner for local SaaS marketing. Streamline reputation management, aggregate business review data, automate responses, and gain invaluable market insights. Trusted by industry leaders, our API offers seamless integration, scalable infrastructure, and flexible pricing for comprehensive reputation management solutions.
name: Publisher Reviews API
title: Publisher Reviews API

api_list.name: getHealthz
api_list.description: Performs various system checks and provides a consolidated system health.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://publisher-reviews-api1.p.rapidapi.com/healthz"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "publisher-reviews-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
